typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Entity as string,
		Code as string,
		Year as integer,
		{Total COVID-19 tests} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrigenDatos
OrigenDatos derive(Suma = {Total COVID-19 tests}+Year) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Destino
